fullName: DS Portal SignIn Feature: Verify that user receives error message for empty Username field during Login

name: Verify that user receives error message for empty Username field during Login

steps.name: Given  The user is on the DS Algo Sign in Page
When  The user clicks login button after entering the Password only from sheetname "login" and row 2
Then  The error message "Please fill out this field." appears below Username textbox
